attributes.action: Demand inquiries into handling & scale of Child Sexual Exploitation abuse by Muslim grooming gangs in all towns and cities across UK
attributes.additional_details:
The recent inquiry in Rotherham unearthed significant abuse and criminal mishandling of child sexual exploitation.

We demand a similar inquiry in all major towns and cities in the UK to indicate how institutionalised the findings in Rotherham are across the countries  authorities and departments.

Starting with those areas where grooming gangs have been convicted and jailed we're operating.
